topic.title: Americans should use metric system
topic.body: Seriously, how can you still use some footsies and penises for measurement? The worst is when I read an online article and they say "50 feet" and then I have to wonder what that means in glorious metric master race.

topic.title: Too much time spent preparing food
topic.body: I'm mad that you have to spend so much time preparing dinners/lunches, that you can't just buy food that works "out of the box". Come on, adults have enough daily chores as it is, and I'd rather spend this time entertaining myself after work. Do some of you guys have some lifehacks to solve this? Is there a healthy, balanced diet that reduces time wasted preparing it to a minimum?

1568557112_14iUZqEe5UECvSmywb1Q2x7mE1X1n.body:
> [leftside](#comment_851_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Take advantage of freezer and microwave.

Yeah but you still have to cook a lot of food in the weekend to have it to unfreeze later. Every weekend, more used up time!

yeah junk food will just lead to illnesses in the long run. 
> [leftside](#comment_852_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): take advantage of improvement of efficiency of repeating the same procedures periodically.
thats actually a good tip
